name: Raid The VIllage
description:
The Vikings have arrived!

At an innocent village, you, a viking raider arrives to loot and pillage everything you can. As you rob more villagers, the villagers will sound the alarms and stronger and stronger guards will come out to defeat you. How much can you manage to gain before finally succumbing to the guards?

Controls

WASD - movement

Left Mouse Button - charge on release

Credits

Music: Until the End, Leaving for Valhalla, Now We Ride by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
